name: Dinosaur Park—Jurassic Tycoon
description:
Are you ready to make your dreams come true and manage a Dinosaur park?

Yes, you read well… Defy the limits of evolution and build your own Jurassic empire with
real-life dinosaurs! Have you ever thought about looking after a T-Rex? Be in charge of the most famous leisure business and amaze dino lovers with your astonishing creatures!

Learn from your experience and become rich thanks to being a worthy dinosaur park manager. Trace your growth strategy while keeping your dinos healthy and under control. Go on expeditions to find the rarest species on this magical island!

GET MULTIPLE SPECIES OF DINOSAURS:

Improve your expedition team as long as you can reinvest your park earnings and find different dinosaurs like Allosaurus, Quetzalcoatlus, Triceratops, Stegosaurus, Brachiosaurus, Iguanodon, or even T-Rex! Numerous species are waiting for your explorers in the mysterious forest to be friendly captured. Bring them to your Dinosaur World, and take care of them!

RECREATE DIFFERENT HABITATS:

Dinosaurs demand specific attention according to their species. Unlock new enclosures and set them up to provide dinosaurs with the best possible environment! See all the areas with the proper natural vegetation, include as many water zones as they require, and, of course… Keep the visitors safe! Dinos are delicate creatures. Try to keep them nourished and happy.

MEET THE NEEDS OF YOUR PARK VISITORS:

“Spared no expense!” Open different services for your clients. A safe park will be a profitable park. Put your scientists to work on new research to enhance the visitor experience!

If you like management and idle games, you will enjoy Idle Dinosaur Park Tycoon! A casual easy-to-play game where strategic decisions have to be taken to manage a dinosaur-themed park with profitable results. Improve your facility starting from a modest enclosure for herbivore dinos and unlock visible progress in your premises. Transform your small project into the best leisure park and become the best Dino manager in the world!

Main Features:

Casual and strategic gameplay for every player
Innovative exploration mode
Intuitive management system
Dozens of objects to be unlocked and upgraded
Lots of detailed dinosaurs and interactions
Funny 3d graphics and great animations
Management of a successful business
A small living world in miniature
